title: Celebrating 10 Million edX Learners Worldwide!
text:
Celebrating 10 Million edX Learners Worldwide! Published on: Feb 02, 2017 by Anant Agarwal 124 views No Comments Share this post on Google Plus 
Today, we celebrate an exciting milestone – our edX learner community is 10 million learners strong! As we mark this momentous occasion, we want to say a big ‘THANK YOU’ to you, our global learners. You inspire all that we do. Since edX was created in 2012, your accomplishments as a community of learners are incredibly impressive. Together, you have: Enrolled in more than 36,000,000 courses , showing your love of learning for subjects from computer science to the science of cooking Tackled 119,000,000 problem sets , working together through forums, social groups and across time zones Watched 230,000,000 videos , sharing content from faculty across the globe that sparks innovative ideas and stimulating discussions 
We are honored to learn with you and from you and we look forward to where the future will take us, together. Share your love of learning using #ILearnatEdX Recommended Posts
